Into the Depths I.name: Into the Depths I
Into the Depths I.description: Complete the Week 1 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager I.name: Front Line Salvager I
Front Line Salvager I.description:
Complete Salvage or Deep Dive activities while using an Arc or Strand subclass.

Additionally, defeat Fallen anywhere in the system.

Successful Salvager.name: Successful Salvager
Successful Salvager.description: Successfully complete jobs in Salvage activities.

The One That Didn't Get Away.name: The One That Didn't Get Away
The One That Didn't Get Away.description:
Catch fish at any Fish Pond.

Additionally, complete public events on any destination.
The One That Didn't Get Away.icon: The One That Didn't Get Away.jpg

EDZ Activities.name: EDZ Activities
EDZ Activities.description: In the EDZ, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Spark Defender.name: Spark Defender
Spark Defender.description: Score points in Rift. Bonus progress is awarded for igniting the Rift.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Standard Issue.name: Standard Issue
Standard Issue.description: Defeat targets in Gambit with Primary ammo. Bonus progress is granted for using Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles. Bonus progress also is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

The Fallen Fall.name: The Fallen Fall
The Fallen Fall.description: Defeat Fallen combatants in Vanguard playlists or strikes. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Calibrate Close Range.name: Calibrate Close Range
Calibrate Close Range.description: Calibrate close-range weapons—Sidearms, Submachine Guns, Shotguns, Glaives, and Swords. Bonus progress for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Wicked Depths.name: Wicked Depths
Wicked Depths.description: Complete the Whetstone encounter in Deep Dives and earn the Wicked Implement Scout Rifle.

Neptune Activities.name: Neptune Activities
Neptune Activities.description: In Neomuna, complete bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Sparks of Arc.name: Sparks of Arc
Sparks of Arc.description: Defeat Guardians in Crucible matches with the Arc subclass equipped. Bonus progress is granted for defeating blinded opponents.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Special Measures.name: Special Measures
Special Measures.description: Defeat targets in Gambit with weapons using Special ammo. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians and landing final blows with Glaives and Hand Cannons using Special ammo.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Tried and True.name: Tried and True
Tried and True.description: Defeat combatants in Vanguard playlists or strikes with Primary ammo. Bonus progress is granted for more challenging combatants.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Into the Depths II.name: Into the Depths II
Into the Depths II.description: Complete the Week 2 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager II.name: Front Line Salvager II
Front Line Salvager II.description:
Open chests in Salvage. Redeeming Salvage Keys grants additional progress.

Additionally, defeat Taken anywhere in the system.

Powerful Salvager.name: Powerful Salvager
Powerful Salvager.description: Defeat powerful combatants in Salvage activities.

Antithetical Armaments.name: Antithetical Armaments
Antithetical Armaments.description: Defeat targets with Shotguns or Sniper Rifles. Defeated Guardians or defeated combatants in Salvage or Deep Dive activities grant additional progress.

Throne World Activities.name: Throne World Activities
Throne World Activities.description: In the Throne World, complete bounties and earn progress by completing patrols, public events, and looting Lost Sectors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Lost in the Legend.name: Lost in the Legend
Lost in the Legend.description: Complete a Lost Sector on Legend or higher.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Flourish of Power.name: Flourish of Power
Flourish of Power.description: Defeat Guardians in the Mayhem playlist with Super abilities.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Primeval Entourage.name: Primeval Entourage
Primeval Entourage.description: Defeat Taken in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Taken Decimator.name: Taken Decimator
Taken Decimator.description: Defeat Taken combatants in Vanguard playlists or strikes. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Calibrate Long Range.name: Calibrate Long Range
Calibrate Long Range.description: Calibrate long-range weapons—Pulse Rifles, Bows, and Trace Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Into the Depths III.name: Into the Depths III
Into the Depths III.description: Complete the Week 3 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager III.name: Front Line Salvager III
Front Line Salvager III.description:
Complete Salvage or Deep Dive activities while wielding any Season of the Deep weapon.

Additionally, defeat targets with Arc or Strand damage anywhere in the system. Guardians grant additional progress.

Short-Range Salvager.name: Short-Range Salvager
Short-Range Salvager.description: Defeat targets with Submachine Guns or Swords. Defeated Guardians or combatants defeated in Salvage or Deep Dive activities grant additional progress.

Nessus Activities.name: Nessus Activities
Nessus Activities.description: On Nessus, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Commendation Appreciation.name: Commendation Appreciation
Commendation Appreciation.description: Earn progress for giving commendations in Vanguard, Crucible, and Gambit activities.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Cosmic Churn.name: Cosmic Churn
Cosmic Churn.description: Defeat Guardians in Crucible. Bonus progress is granted for opponents defeated with Arc, Strand, and Void ability final blows.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Bank, Kill, Repeat.name: Bank, Kill, Repeat
Bank, Kill, Repeat.description: Earn points by banking Motes, defeating Blockers, and defeating Guardians in Gambit.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Ultimate Champion.name: Ultimate Champion
Ultimate Champion.description: Defeat Champions in any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher. Earn bonus progress at higher difficulty tiers.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Mid-Range Calibration.name: Mid-Range Calibration
Mid-Range Calibration.description: Calibrate mid-range weapons—Hand Cannons, Glaives, Auto Rifles, Fusion Rifles, and Machine Guns. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Into the Depths IV.name: Into the Depths IV
Into the Depths IV.description: Complete the Week 4 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager IV.name: Front Line Salvager IV
Front Line Salvager IV.description:
Complete Salvage or Deep Dive activities while using a Void subclass.

Additionally, defeat Hive anywhere in the system.

Deep Diver.name: Deep Diver
Deep Diver.description: Successfully complete encounters at any depth in Deep Dive activities. Pressure Trial encounters grant increased progress.

Commendable Salvager.name: Commendable Salvager
Commendable Salvager.description: Give or receive commendations in matchmade Salvage activities.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Momentum Crash.name: Momentum Crash
Momentum Crash.description: Defeat Guardians in Momentum Control. Earn bonus progress with Zone Advantage.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Sound of Metal.name: Sound of Metal
Sound of Metal.description: Defeat targets with Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles in Gambit. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Darkest Nightfall.name: Darkest Nightfall
Darkest Nightfall.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Precision Calibration.name: Precision Calibration
Precision Calibration.description: Calibrate marksman weapons—Scout Rifles, Sniper Rifles, and Linear Fusion Rifles—by landing precision final blows. Bonus progress against Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Into the Depths V.name: Into the Depths V
Into the Depths V.description: Complete the Week 5 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager V.name: Front Line Salvager V
Front Line Salvager V.description:
Complete 8 bounties from the Sonar Station in the H.E.L.M.

Additionally, defeat powerful combatants anywhere in the system.

Heavy Salvager.name: Heavy Salvager
Heavy Salvager.description: Defeat combatants with Power weapons in Salvage activities.

Prepared for War.name: Prepared for War
Prepared for War.description: Defeat targets with Hand Cannons or Pulse Rifles. Defeated Guardians or combatants defeated in Salvage or Deep Dive activities grant additional progress.

Battle Rhythm.name: Battle Rhythm
Battle Rhythm.description: Defeat targets anywhere in the system while using Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, or Linear Fusion Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Gotta Win Them All.name: Gotta Win Them All
Gotta Win Them All.description: Complete activities in Vanguard, Gambit, or Crucible playlists. Bonus progress is granted for completing Vanguard playlist activities at Hero difficulty or higher, or for winning Gambit or Crucible matches.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Iron Sharpens Iron.name: Iron Sharpens Iron
Iron Sharpens Iron.description: Complete Iron Banner matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Into the Depths VI.name: Into the Depths VI
Into the Depths VI.description: Complete the Week 6 "Into the Depths" mission.

Front Line Salvager VI.name: Front Line Salvager VI
Front Line Salvager VI.description:
Open chests in Deep Dive activities. Redeeming Deep Dive Keys grants bonus progress.

Additionally, defeat targets with Void damage anywhere in the system. Guardians grant increased progress.

Under Pressure.name: Under Pressure
Under Pressure.description:
Successfully complete a Pressure Trial encounter at any depth in a Deep Dive activity.

Additionally, defeat bosses and minibosses in Deep Dive activities.

Go Big (Fish) or Go Home.name: Go Big (Fish) or Go Home
Go Big (Fish) or Go Home.description:
Catch large or bigger fish at any Fish Pond.

Fish must be at least 18kg to be considered large.

Round and Round We Go.name: Round and Round We Go
Round and Round We Go.description: Generate Orbs of Power in Vanguard, Gambit, or Crucible playlists.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

The Deep End.name: The Deep End
The Deep End.description:
Defeat opponents in the Crucible with Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, or Linear Fusion Rifles.

Additional progress is granted for landing final blows with Glaives, Linear Fusion Rifles, and Hand Cannons that use Special ammo.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Boss Battle.name: Boss Battle
Boss Battle.description: Defeat bosses in strikes or Vanguard playlists.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Front Line Salvager VII.name: Front Line Salvager VII
Front Line Salvager VII.description:
Complete Salvage or Deep Dive activities while wearing Season of the Deep armor.

Additionally, defeat bosses and minibosses anywhere in the system.

Salvaged Munitions.name: Salvaged Munitions
Salvaged Munitions.description: Defeat targets with Seasonal weapons. Defeated Guardians or combatants defeated in Salvage or Deep Dive activities grant additional progress.

Fleeting Glory.name: Fleeting Glory
Fleeting Glory.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Competitive playlist. Earn bonus progress for wins.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

High-Value Hunter.name: High-Value Hunter
High-Value Hunter.description: Defeat powerful combatants in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating high-value targets.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Grandmaster.name: Grandmaster
Grandmaster.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Grandmaster.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Super Salvager.name: Super Salvager
Super Salvager.description: Defeat combatants with Super abilities in Salvage activities.

Treasures from the Deep.name: Treasures from the Deep
Treasures from the Deep.description: Complete a Deep Dive activity with the highest tier reward bonus.

Commendable Diver.name: Commendable Diver
Commendable Diver.description: Give or receive commendations in matchmade Deep Dive activities.

Pinnacle.name: Pinnacle
Pinnacle.description: Reach Power Level {var:1131227462} by earning pinnacle rewards.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Trial by Firing Squad.name: Trial by Firing Squad
Trial by Firing Squad.description: Win multiple rounds in the Trials of Osiris.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Broadside.name: Broadside
Broadside.description: Defeat targets in Gambit with Power Weapons. Bonus progress is granted for final blows with Linear Fusion Rifles and for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Implements of War.name: Implements of War
Implements of War.description: Defeat targets with Auto Rifles, Hand Cannons, Scout Rifles, Glaives, and Linear Fusion Rifles. Bonus progress is granted for defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Rapid Salvager.name: Rapid Salvager
Rapid Salvager.description: Rapidly defeat combatants in Salvage activities.

Patience Perfected.name: Patience Perfected
Patience Perfected.description: Catch Legendary or Exotic fish at any Fish Pond.

Ritual Ornament.name: Ritual Ornament
Ritual Ornament.description: Acquire any ornament for the Seasonal ritual weapon.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Eyeing Iron.name: Eyeing Iron
Eyeing Iron.description: Complete Crucible matches. Earn bonus progress in Iron Banner and for victories.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Ethereal Might.name: Ethereal Might
Ethereal Might.description: Defeat targets with an Arc, Strand, or Void subclass equipped in Gambit. Bonus progress is granted for ability final blows and defeating Guardians.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Rapid Precision.name: Rapid Precision
Rapid Precision.description: Get rapid precision final blows. Bonus progress is granted for every defeated target after the second one.

rewardItems.name: Bright Dust
rewardItems.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.

Gills Acquired.name: Gills Acquired
Gills Acquired.description: Complete all Season of the Deep challenges.
